name: Ecotone (itch) (jvlyndark)
description:
Ecotone is the game of formation. A classic 2D platformer meets choose-your-own-adventure down the rabbit hole of self-discovery. Every choice evolves your character, transporting you to a unique world that further immerses you in your journey towards knowing your truest self. The question is: Who will you be, today?

Music, visuals, and design by J'vlyn d'Ark
